history.content:
L&S Students: Today is the P/NP deadline for all courses

  • Please remember that all major or minor requirements must be fulfilled via letter grade. 
  • Please note that students may not repeat courses they earn a grade "P" or C- or higher in (source)
  • If you're considering P/NP a major pre-req, please ensure you're familiar with @3105

CoE Students: Today is the P/NP deadline for HSS courses. 

Most administrative offices close at 4pm, and staff/tech support leave campus at 5pm. Therefore, you should make all actions this afternoon, in case something goes wrong. 

If you experience technical difficulties with SIS, please contact their team directly via: http://sisproject.berkeley.edu/help
history.subject: Today is P/NP Deadline (more info)
